en.message_possibly_wrong_web_authn_flow_1: The wrong domain was set for the passkey and the browser couldn't find it.
en.message_possibly_wrong_web_authn_flow_2: Try again and another domain will be used.
en.message_pin_another_domain_1: You seem to be using a PIN identity created in another domain.
en.message_pin_another_domain_2: To access this domain you need to go to the other domain and add a passkey.
